data.title: NIO - Nicaraguan Cordoba rates, news, and tools
data.meta_description: Get Nicaraguan Cordoba rates, news, and facts. Also available are services like cheap money transfers, a currency data API, and more.
data.text:
NIO - Nicaraguan Cordoba

The Nicaraguan Cordoba is the currency of Nicaragua. Our currency rankings show that the most popular Nicaraguan Cordoba exchange rate is the NIO to USD rate. The currency code for Cordobas is NIO , and the currency symbol is C$. Below, you'll find Nicaraguan Cordoba rates and a currency converter.
